## Meeting Date: November 5, 2025

### Key Discussion Points
Discussed Q4 roadmap priorities with the client.

### Client Requests
1. Enhanced reporting dashboard
2. API rate limit increase
3. Custom branding options

### Action Items
- [ ] Prototype dashboard mockups (Due: End of week)
- [ ] Send follow-up email to client
- [ ] Schedule technical review session

### Related Files
- Notes/2025-11-05-meeting.md
- Projects/ClientPortal/notes.md
- Tasks/TODO.md

---
